Reviews.Title: Very good product and easy to install
Reviews.Author: M. Cristo-johnson
Reviews.Content: Products works great, easy to install, easy to understand, very happy with it andI was also able to use some older camera I had with it until I could purchase more. The only down side was I was able to view on one cell phone but not the other, I don't know whether it only allows one cell phone to access or it is a issue with my phone or carrier, but no big deal, as long as one of us, wife or husband can check in during the day and see what is going on that is all that matters. Thanks for making it easy.

Reviews.Title: Works OK
Reviews.Author: SebastianA
Reviews.Content: First I was confused because I was expecting the cameras to be Sony branded and the outside was just the way are the Zmodo cameras, so I sent an email and they explained that the sensors in my cameras were Sony.The quality of image is fine, but is not the most clear image. But I can't complain because you can see enough details through image. Works good during night and day as well.You have to figure out what to do if the cables are not long enough, so you might think about that before you try to install the system.If you have to connect the DVR to a TV you have to buy the cable and adaptors, so think about that. If you have a computer monitor you don't have to worry about that.

Reviews.Title: regular cameras
Reviews.Author: Moncho
Reviews.Content: dvr works fine but the cameras do not have very good resolution but for the price this is more than good
